Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky brown below; part of lotus palmette in added white outline with added red centre; top of rim glazed; exterior, slip very worn; trace of rim pattern; below, painted decoration consisting of sphinx (part of neck, cheek, earring and hair with red remaining) to left.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the exterior and interior decoration, see Heidelberg I38, though there the drawing is mainly in dilute.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0427) (phase 2)
